alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dona Ana and west central El Paso Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunland Park, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Santa Teresa, Sunland Park and Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
